title: SVOM Alert
description: ECLAIRs or GRM trigger parameters computed onboard

notice_level.description: SVOM notice reference id. N1e is an ECLAIRs trigger, N1g a GRM trigger.

trigger_type.description: In case of an ECLAIRs trigger, specifices whether count rate or image trigger

triggered_GRDs.description: In case of a GRM trigger, trigger status the 3 GRDs. Each digit correspond to one of the 3 GRDs. 1 means the GRD triggers, 0 not
